xQTLbiolinks 0.1.0
  • Reference

    xQTLdownload_exp

    xQTLdownload_exp.Rd

    download normalized gene expression at the sample level in a specified tissue.

    Usage

    xQTLdownload_exp(
  genes = "",
  geneType = "auto",
  tissueSiteDetail = "Liver",
  datasetId = "gtex_v8",
  toSummarizedExperiment = TRUE,
  recordPerChunk = 150,
  pathologyNotesCategories = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    genes

    Following gene types are supported:

    • Gene symbol.

      A character string or a character vector (case ignored). like: "tp53","naDK","SDF4".

    • Gencode/ensemble id (versioned or unversioned).

    geneType

    A character string. Types of queried genes. Options: "auto" (default), "geneSymbol" and "gencodeId";

    tissueSiteDetail

    All tissues' name can be listed with \"tissueSiteDetailGTExv8\" or \"tissueSiteDetailGTExv7\"

    datasetId

    A character string. Options: "gtex_v8" (default), "gtex_v7".

    toSummarizedExperiment

    whether to return a data.frame or a summarizedExperiment object. Default: TRUE, return a toSummarizedExperiment object.

    recordPerChunk

    A integer value (1-2000). number of records fetched per request (default: 150).

    pathologyNotesCategories

    Default: pathologyNotes info is ignored.

    Value

    return a SummarizedExperiment or data.frame object harbing gene expression profiles.

    Examples

    # \donttest{
  # Download gene expression with a genecode ID:
  expProfiles <- xQTLdownload_exp(c("ENSG00000210195.2"),
                                 tissueSiteDetail="Liver")
#> == Check the gene name :
#> Querying genes... | 2022-6月-01 16:35:15 
#> 1 record has been obtained!
#> == Done.
#> == Get the samples' detail:
#> Querying samples by tissue... | 2022-6月-01 16:35:16 
#> Total records: 226; downloaded: 1/2
#> Total records: 226; downloaded: 2/2
#> == Done.
#> == Get the gene expression:
#> Downloaded part 1/1; 1 records.
#> == Done.
  # extract expression profile from SummarizedExperiment object:
  expDT <- SummarizedExperiment::assay(expProfiles)
  # extract samples' detail from SummarizedExperiment object:
  sampleDT <- SummarizedExperiment::colData(expProfiles)

  # Download gene expression profiles of multiple genes:
  expProfiles <- xQTLdownload_exp(c("tp53","naDK","SDF4"),
                                 tissueSiteDetail="Artery - Coronary",
                                 pathologyNotesCategories=TRUE,
                                 toSummarizedExperiment=FALSE)
#> == Check the gene name :
#> Querying genes... | 2022-6月-01 16:35:19 
#> Batch 1/1. Downloaded  page1/1; 3 records.
#> == Done.
#> == Get the samples' detail:
#> Querying samples by tissue... | 2022-6月-01 16:35:20 
#> Total records: 240; downloaded: 1/2
#> Total records: 240; downloaded: 2/2
#> == Done.
#> == Get the gene expression:
#> Downloaded part 1/1; 3 records.
#> == Done.
  expProfiles <- xQTLdownload_exp(c("tp53","naDK","SDF4"),
                                 tissueSiteDetail="Artery - Coronary",
                                 datasetId="gtex_v7")
#> == Check the gene name :
#> Querying genes... | 2022-6月-01 16:35:23 
#> Batch 1/1. Downloaded  page1/1; 3 records.
#> == Done.
#> == Get the samples' detail:
#> Querying samples by tissue... | 2022-6月-01 16:35:24 
#> Total records: 173; downloaded: 1/2
#> Total records: 173; downloaded: 2/2
#> == Done.
#> == Get the gene expression:
#> Downloaded part 1/1; 3 records.
#> == Done.

  # Get proteing-coding genes' expression in Lung:
  # prot <- xQTLquery_gene(genes="protein coding")
  # proTexp <- xQTLdownload_exp(proT$geneSymbol, tissueSiteDetail="Lung",
  #                             toSummarizedExperiment=FALSE)
  # }
